sentences.en: After all, 15 minutes of exercise is better than nothing.
sentences.cn: 毕竟，锻炼15分钟比不锻炼好。

sentences.en: Although it's not strenuous exercise, you feel toned-up, supple and relaxed.
sentences.cn: 虽然这不是剧烈运动，但会让人感到强健、柔韧与放松。

sentences.en: Any exercise that causes undue shortness of breath should be stopped.
sentences.cn: 任何导致呼吸出现困难的锻炼都应停止。

sentences.en: Exercise has a major part to play in preventing and combating disease.
sentences.cn: 体育锻炼在疾病防治方面发挥着重要作用。

sentences.en: Exercise will give you a glow of satisfaction at having achieved something.
sentences.cn: 运动将让你体会到一种有所成就的无比喜悦感。

sentences.en: He collapsed following a vigorous exercise session at his home.
sentences.cn: 在家剧烈运动了一阵后他突然昏倒了。

sentences.en: Horses need to be exercised regularly.
sentences.cn: 马需要有规律的训练。

sentences.en: I find it really hard to drag myself out and exercise regularly.
sentences.cn: 我发现要让我自己定期出门锻炼真的很难。

sentences.en: It is a very rewarding exercise to work this out oneself.
sentences.cn: 独自解决这个问题是一次受益匪浅的锻炼。

sentences.en: It’s important to exercise regularly.
sentences.cn: 经常锻炼很重要。

sentences.en: Lack of exercise can lead to feelings of depression and exhaustion.
sentences.cn: 缺乏锻炼会导致抑郁和疲劳。

sentences.en: Other amenities, less commonly available, include a library and exercise room.
sentences.cn: 还有一些不太常有的设施，包括图书馆和健身房。

sentences.en: relaxation exercises
sentences.cn: 放松练习

sentences.en: role-play exercises
sentences.cn: 角色扮演练习

sentences.en: Swimming is probably the best form of exercise you can get.
sentences.cn: 游泳或许是现有的最佳锻炼方式。

sentences.en: Television broadcasters were warned to exercise caution over depicting scenes of violence.
sentences.cn: 电视台受到警告，要求对暴力场面的描绘采取谨慎态度。

sentences.en: The object of the exercise is to raise money for the charity.
sentences.cn: 那样做旨在筹集善款。

sentences.en: The physical benefits of exercise can be divided into three factors.
sentences.cn: 运动对身体的好处可以分为3个方面。

sentences.en: They learnt a lot from the initial market testing exercise.
sentences.cn: 他们从最初的市场测试中了解了许多信息。

sentences.en: Try to fit some regular exercise into your daily routine.
sentences.cn: 尽量在日常生活中安排一些经常性的锻炼。

sentences.en: Working in an office, I don’t get much exercise.
sentences.cn: 由于在办公室工作，我很少运动。

words.tran_cn: 做运动的人；肌肉锻练器具；试验程序
运动；练习；运用；操练；礼拜；典礼

phrases.tran_cn: 运动生理学；运动生物学
行使价格；合约价；预购股票价格
常规性的锻炼；经常操练，按时训练

trans.tran_en: physical activities that you do in order to stay healthy and become stronger
physical activities that you do in order to stay healthy and become stronger
physical activities that you do in order to stay healthy and become stronger
to do sports or other physical activities in order to stay healthy or become stronger; to make an animal do this
